title: Orca install issue
body:
I was trying to do spack install orca. It needs manual download of package. After downloading when i try to install, i found the package.py file has different name to be used  for downloaded file as 
 orca_4_2_1_linux_x86-64_openmpi3.1.4.tar.xz  instead of 
orca_4_2_1_linux_x86-64_openmpi314.tar.xz
 When i renamed it and the install seemed to move to next stage and got a new error with checksum like this below.

 Installing orca-4.2.1-2ehxs6lu2klhyj6p4epruilvay2sdf66
==> No binary for orca-4.2.1-2ehxs6lu2klhyj6p4epruilvay2sdf66 found: installing from source
==> Warning: Missing a source id for slurm@20.11.0
==> Fetching file:///home/dianariv/orca_4_2_1_linux_x86-64_openmpi3.1.4.tar.xz
############################################################################################# 100.0%
==> Error: ChecksumError: sha256 checksum failed for /tmp/dianariv/spack-stage/spack-stage-orca-4.2.1-2ehxs6lu2klhyj6p4epruilvay2sdf66/orca_4_2_1_linux_x86-64_openmpi3.1.4.tar.xz
    Expected 9bbb3bfdca8220b417ee898b27b2885508d8c82799adfa63dde9e72eab49a6b2 but got a1ff07bb01ac81ce9a4d6637fef77c12d0ec45354cebc72245c4e0d1620af956

/opt/apps/nfs/spack-quanah/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py:1364, in do_fetch:
       1361        self.stage.fetch(mirror_only, err_msg=err_msg)
       1362        self._fetch_time = time.time() - start_time
       1363
  >>   1364        if checksum and self.version in self.versions:
       1365            self.stage.check()
       1366
       1367        self.stage.cache_local()


==> Error: orca-4.2.1-2ehxs6lu2klhyj6p4epruilvay2sdf66: ChecksumError: sha256 checksum failed for /tmp/dianariv/spack-stage/spack-stage-orca-4.2.1-2ehxs6lu2klhyj6p4epruilvay2sdf66/orca_4_2_1_linux_x86-64_openmpi3.1.4.tar.xz
    Expected 9bbb3bfdca8220b417ee898b27b2885508d8c82799adfa63dde9e72eab49a6b2 but got a1ff07bb01ac81ce9a4d6637fef77c12d0ec45354cebc72245c4e0d1620af956
==> Error: orca-4.2.1-2ehxs6lu2klhyj6p4epruilvay2sdf66: Package was not installed
